english.segment1: Jesus, Alpha and Omega. Lord of all creation. Beginning and the End
english.segment2: Spirit, ever present comfort. Granting us a peace. We could never comprehend
english.segment3: Jesus, conqueror of sin. With the power to rise again. You're the victor over death
english.segment4: Savior, Holy as You are. You removed our sin as far. As the east is from the west
english.segment5: Jesus, King of every king. The One who reigns in majesty. Sovereign God, Maker of every galaxy. Seated high on Your throne. The One who reigns inside of me. God who saves, we proclaim Your majesty
english.segment6: Jesus, equal to the Father. Glory, praise and honor. Majesty and power
english.segment7: Never leaving or forsaking. Inhabiting our praises. In this very hour
english.segment8: And we have come to lift You up. We have come to lift You up. We bow before You. We adore You God. We adore You God
